sentences.sContent: While he was still young and strong all paid obeisance to him.
sentences.sCn: 他年轻力壮时所有人都对他毕恭毕敬。

remMethod.val: ob(加强) + eis(=aud 听话) + ance → 表示听话 → 鞠躬

trans.tranCn: 敬礼, 鞠躬, 顿首, 服从
trans.tranOther: respect and obedience to someone or something, often shown by bending your head or the upper part of your body
